attributes.action: Petition the residents of the UK to help us make our borders more secure.
attributes.background:
I'm just an average British woman, living in the UK who feels strongly that it is time  we closed our borders to help protect ourselves and our families and friends from threat of harm from extremists.

Would you help me to try to make our borders more secure by signing this petition please?

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be calling on citizens of the UK, not the Government or Parliament, to act.

You might be interested in signing this petition, which calls for Government action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107516
